author: paulhauner
content: Can someone remind me when we can expect EL releases with the TTD, please? Is it the week of 22nd of August, or the previous week? My memory gets a bit leaky at 1am ðŸ˜…

author: ajsutton
content: All clients, EL and CL should have releases out with the TTD by 22 August at the latest. Blog post announcing them goes out 23 August. We originally were going to hold off on releases until at least the 18th August to see if the DAG increase caused a significant drop in hash rate but it doesn't sound like that's actually a concern now.
